alert.note: Alert for Inyo; San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 20 at 3:34PM PDT until August 20 at 7:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL INYO AND WESTERN SAN BERNARDINO COUNTIES... At 334 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. CHP reports heavy flooding pushing debris across the roadway east of Joshua Tree across State Route 62 from Cactus Jack to Godwin. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Twentynine Palms, Barstow, Fort Irwin, Daggett, Yucca Valley, Twentynine Palms Base, Newberry Springs, Afton Canyon Campground, Ludlow, Owl Canyon Campground, Joshua Tree Lake Campground, Joshua Tree, Amboy, Twentynine Palms Airport, Trona, Homewood Canyon-Valley Wells, Nebo Center, Lenwood and Searles Valley. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
